message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it's a fantastic deal and worth every penny.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. That's the price I'm willing to pay.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  $120 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $160. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for the value you're getting.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
